data.title: Robert Curry, Bob Curry, Real Estate, Lawyer
data.meta_description: Searchable database of Thompson Hine Lawyers and Professionals
data.text:
Focus Areas

Real Estate>

Co-author, Chambers USA Regional Real Estate – Ohio (2018 – 2021)

Co-author, Ohio Real Property Law and Practice, Sixth Edition, two volume treatise, Mathew Bender (Lexis/Nexis), 2006 with annual supplements through 2017

Co-author, Ohio Real Property Law and Practice, Fifth Edition, 1996, 1997

Co-author, “Ohio Land Contract Law,” University of Dayton Law Review, 1994

Author, McDermott’s Ohio Real Property Law and Practice, Fourth Edition, Volume 3 (Forms), 1989

“Real Estate Update,” Ohio State Bar Association

“Case Law and Legislation Update,” Ohio State Bar Association Convention

“First and Second Amendment Rights and Ohio Parks,” Ohio Parks and Recreation Association Conference

“Legal Issues in Real Estate Development,” Dayton Area Board of Realtors

“Reviewing Agreements of Sale,” OSBA/CLE Institute Seminar

“Ohio Agency Review,” Seminars for Dayton Area Board of Realtors

“Corporate Closing Real Estate Documentation,” OSBA/CLE Institute Seminar

“Drafting Conservation Easements,” Conference on Agricultural and Natural Resource Conservation Easements

Recipient of Ohio Legal Assistance Foundation Presidential Award for Pro Bono Service, 2019

Listed in The Legal 500 in Real Estate, 2020, 2022

Selected as an Acritas Star, a “client-nominated, stand-out lawyer”

AV® Preeminent Rated by Martindale-Hubbell

Named to Who’s Who in Real Estate, Dayton Business Journal, 2015 and 2019

Recipient of Distinguished Service Award from Dayton-area legal aid organizations, 2014

Recipient of Robert L. Hausser Award from Real Property Law Section of Ohio State Bar Association, 2013

Recipient of Smith-Moore Award from United Way of Greater Dayton Area, 2012

Selected for inclusion in Chambers USA: America’s Leading Lawyers for Business, Real Estate, Ohio, 2007 to 2024

Selected for inclusion in The Best Lawyers in America® for more than 35 years for Real Estate Law

Named Best Lawyers® 2009 Real Estate “Lawyer of the Year” in Dayton

Named a “Client Service All-Star” in the BTI Consulting Group’s annual survey of Fortune 1000 Corporate Counsel, 2008

Selected to the Ohio Super Lawyers list, 2005 to 2021, 2023, 2024

Selected to Top 100: Ohio Super Lawyers list, 2011

American College of Real Estate Lawyers, member

American Bar Foundation, fellow

Ohio State Bar Foundation, fellow

Dayton Bar Foundation, fellow

American Bar Association

University of Dayton School of Law Advisory Council, past board member

Downtown Dayton Partnership, past board member
